    üåü About Your Guide ‚Äì Svetlana Kaivalya

    With over 20 years in Raja & Buddhi Yoga and 8 years in Sound Therapy, Svetlana has guided more than 6,000 people worldwide through sound healing journeys.

    She is certified by ISTA, IOCE, IASH, Tone of Life, and the Tibetan Golden Temple Centre. She is also the founder of Samui Sound Healing Sanctuary Shantika, where she trains practitioners who now run sound healing centers globally üåç.

    Through her unique blend of ancient wisdom and modern science, Svetlana helps students connect with sound as a tool for healing and transformation.
